snippet.title: Youda Survivor Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Free: http://www.gamefools.com/pc-games/youda-survivor.html

Restore life to an uncharted island. Care for a variety of animals and convert the goods they produce into an assortment of products. Fend off pirates with your trusty sword and capture crabs with a click of your mouse. Then purchase the upgrades you need to get the job done. Featuring 80 levels of exciting point-and-click action, Youda Survivor will make you feel like a modern day Robinson Crusoe.
